search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for ScoreApp (scoreapp.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for ScoreApp is: [https://www.scoreapp.com/pricing/](https://www.scoreapp.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Choose from one of our plans or get started with our [free plan](https://manage.scoreapp.com/registration/sign-up/)

Starter plan
------------

Everything you need to start generating data rich leads

$37

USD per month

Billed at ~$529.20~ $441.00/yr

*   5 live Scorecards
*   Includes 200 responses per month
*   1 user

### Key Features:

*   Unlimited landing pages
*   Dynamic result pages
*   View & export all response data
*   Connect your CRM

Business plan
-------------

Generate more leads and more data

$75

USD per month

Billed at ~$1069.20~ $891.00/yr

*   10 live Scorecards
*   Includes 1000 responses per month
*   3 users

### Key Features:

*   Everything from starter
*   Use your own domain
*   Abandon email
*   Advanced insights
*   Custom CSS / Scripts
*   Google Analytics & Facebook pixel
*   Dynamic PDF Report
*   Audiences

Pro plan
--------

Advanced features for making more sales

$112

USD per month

Billed at ~$1609.20~ $1341.00/yr

*   30 live Scorecards
*   Includes 3000 responses per month
*   5 users

### Key Features:

*   Everything from business
*   Data enrichment
*   Split testing

Enterprise plan
---------------

Scale up as required, with tailored plans and onboarding

POA

Pricing on application

*   Infinitely scalable
*   Seats for everyone
*   VIP support
*   Tailored onboarding
*   Granular permissions
*   SSO

All prices shown are subject to any applicable taxes in your location

### Accepted Payment Methods

![Image 1: Payment cards accepted](https://cdn.scoreapp.com/site/uploads/2025/01/card-logos.png)

![Image 2: Money back guarantee icon](https://cdn.scoreapp.com/site/uploads/2025/01/money-back.png)

### Money Back Guarantee

Try ScoreApp for 14 days and if your not 100% satisfied then we will give you your money back.

![Image 3: SSL security icon](https://cdn.scoreapp.com/site/uploads/2025/01/secure-payment.png)

### SSL Secure Payment

Your information is protected by 256-bit SSL encryption.

Compare our plans

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual billing offers discounted rates compared to monthly billing.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Everything you need to start generating data rich leads.
Generate more leads and more data.
Advanced features for making more sales.
Scale up as required, with tailored plans and onboarding.
